title: Galaxy Watch 5 might not offer body temperature measurements after all
content:
In the world of Wear OS, Samsung’s Galaxy Watch 4 offers one of the most complete experiences for health and fitness tracking. Earlier this year, it was expected that the Galaxy Watch 5 would build on that package with body temperature measurements, but it seems that might not work out.

more…

The post Galaxy Watch 5 might not offer body temperature measurements after all appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: According to a respected analyst, the Galaxy Watch 5 probably won't support body temperature measurements after all, despite earlier reports.
